alert.note: Alert for Harding; Mora (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 1:30PM MDT until June 12 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Harding County in northeastern New Mexico... Southeastern Mora County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 130 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wagon Mound, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wagon Mound. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 379 and 391. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
